mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce.produce_information (produceId, produceName, produceIndustry, deviceNode, accessProtocol, networkingMode, produceModel, produceDescription) VALUES (#{produceId}, #{produceName}, #{produceIndustry}, #{deviceNode}, #{accessProtocol}, #{networkingMode}, #{produceModel}, #{produceDescription});
mapper.update: UPDATE produce.produce_information SET produceName = #{produceName}, produceIndustry = #{produceIndustry}, deviceNode = #{deviceNode}, accessProtocol = #{accessProtocol}, networkingMode = #{networkingMode}, produceModel = #{produceModel}, produceDescription = #{produceDescription} WHERE produceId = #{produceId};
mapper.select: SELECT produceId, produceName, produceIndustry, deviceNode, accessProtocol, networkingMode, produceModel, produceDescription FROM produce.produce_information WHERE produceId = #{produceId};
